body:
# Felix Zhao
## Developer

![flag](/images/felixzhao.jpg)
---
> [felixzhao.github.io](http://felixzhao.github.io)

> [felixz2010 [at] gmail.com](mailto:felixz2010@gmail.com)

> (86) 18621518021

------

### Education
* 2012 - 2014 Shanghai Jiao Tong University
       - Master
       - Computer Science for NLP Direction
* 2006 - 2009 Fudan University
       - Bachelor
       - Software Engineering

---

### Tech

1. Dot NET Framework
1. Azure
1. C#
1. WCF
1. ASP .NET MVC
1. SQL Server
1. Python
1. Perl
1. JavaScript / jQuery
1. Git

------

### Language
* Mandarin *** native language ***
* English *** proficient in both spoken and written English ***

------

### Experience

* 2013.04--Now HP
      - Special List Level 4
      - Shanghai, Beijing
      - Business Intelligence Analysis for Commercial Team.
      - Achievements:
		1. Online Review Tools for HP China sales group preference review;
		2. I am regularly located between Shanghai office and Beijing headquarter.


* 2010--2013 Microsoft ( contract with Beyondsoft )
      - SDE software develop engineer
      - Redmond U.S., Shanghai China
      - Lead an offshore team
      - I am regularly located between Redmond Main campus and Shanghai campus.
      - Working for Microsoft CLiX Team
        + Imassive documents analysis platform Develop.


* 2009--2010 Shanghai Transportation Investment Information Technology CO,LTD.
      - Software Developer
      - Shanghai China
      - A State Owned Company.
      - Play DEV role for Transportation intelligent system development.
      - Achievements:
	    + Shanghai Bus Company working schedule system;
		+ Shanghai Bus Company working schedule generate project replaced manual work with automatic generation. 
        + This project has been widely accepted and used in Shanghai BASHI Group.
	    + I Designed the *** MinSet algorithm *** to improve the Algorithm performance from exponential to O(1).

* before 2008 China Construction Bank
      - staff
      - Mainframe computer operations and management.


------

### Project

* CliX Content QA System
      - Content QA Gateway Service
          + This service is an interface for outside system
          + Independntly complete development
          + Familar with \textbf{Restful} techncial
      - Content QA Syndication Service
          + This service is duty to expose feeds
          + Independntly complete development
          + Familar with WCF syndication
      - Stringy Plugin
          + This plugin is a component of QA system which detects key word in documents
          + Maintain this plugin and add new features
      - Language Detect Plugin
          + This plugin is a component of QA system which detects language of each document
          + Design and develop this plugin
          + *** Host Perl code in IIS. ***
       - Content QA Controller Service
          + This service is the core of Content QA system
          + Maintain this service and add new feature
          + Refactor job scheduling
      - Content QA Controller Azure platform
          + Upgrade system to Azure platform
          + Create work role
          + Familar with \textbf{Azure} platform.
    
---

### Sparetime Project

* Sentiment Words digging in Chinese Document
      - A NLP project
      - Achievements:
        + Word segmentation by ICTCLA
        + Detect Sentiment Words based on HowNet
        + Emotion tendeny judgement by Language Model plus Smooth
* Search Engine
      - The primary target of this project is fimilar with Hadoop
      - Achievements:
        + Crawls web site
        + Implement Hadoop Cluster
        + Generate invert index by Map Reduce

### Certification

* Computer Science
      - Qualification Certificate of Computer and Software Technology Proficiency
